channel.title: The Tommerty Blog on Tommerty
channel.description: Recent content in The Tommerty Blog on Tommerty

item.title: Breakup; What happens next...
item.description: Where do I even begin? A breakup is never going to be easy, no matter how long or short you’re in it.

item.title: Integrating Mastodon with Discord
item.description: There’s something special about Mastodon I don’t know how to put it, it’s just amazing. It takes Twitter but siphons out all the BS.

item.title: My experience running a Mastodon Instance
item.description: Let get something out of the way first… This was complicated. I was hoping for a easy-to-use Docker experience, and that’s not what I found.

item.title: Privacy covers on "selected" devices
item.description: This just bothers me beyond belief… Right, so we all know how people on both Mac, Windows and even Linux use privacy covers for their laptops and desktop webcams?

item.title: test post
item.description: Welcome to the Tommerty Blog This is my first post using Hugo the Congo theme, so fingers crossed all goes well!
